current_result.summary: Collected requirements for artificer-conversations MVP: a lightweight queue-based conversation system for the Artificer ecosystem. Key features include: (1) ArtificerModule integration with CLI auto-discovery, (2) CLI commands for add/list/next/start operations, (3) JSON-based storage in .artificer/conversations/, and (4) ConversationStep for workflow integration with pause capability. The system follows FIFO queue semantics with idempotent operations.

artifact.description: Full requirements document for artificer-conversations MVP

current_result.architecture_analysis: This is a greenfield project integrating with the Artificer ecosystem. The artificer-cli already expects 'artificer.conversations.module.ConversationsModule' in its BUILTIN_MODULES registry. The architecture follows the same patterns as artificer-workflows: a module.py for CLI registration, storage layer for persistence, and optional workflow step integration. The project will live at the 'artificer.conversations' namespace package.
simplifications_needed: No existing code to simplify - greenfield project
Keep the storage layer minimal - single file for all JSON operations
Avoid over-engineering the queue - simple list in index.json is sufficient
No need for complex state machine - binary queued/not-queued state only
refactoring_required: None - this is a new project with no existing code to refactor
current_result.architecture_changes: Created initial architecture with four components: (1) module.py for ArtificerModule CLI integration, (2) storage.py for JSON file I/O, (3) models.py for Pydantic data models, (4) step.py for optional workflow ConversationStep. All components follow artificer-workflows patterns for consistency.

Implementation order: models → storage → module → step → tests.
